situation: I see trees of green, red roses too I see them blooms, for me and you And I think to myself.
What a wonderful world I see skies of blue and clouds of white The bright blessed day, the dark sacred night.
And I think to myself. What a wonderful world. The colors of the rainbow so pretty in the sky. Or also on the faces of people going by

I see friends shaking hands, saying "How do you do?" They're really saying, I love you I hear babies crying, I watch them grow They'll learn much more and I'll never know And I think to myself What a wonderful world Yes, I think to myself What a wonderful world Oh yeah
sentence: Someone thinks this is a wonderful world.
